<?xml version="1.0"?> <xsl:transform xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0" xmlns:cdr="cips.nci.nih.gov/cdr"> <xsl:output method="text"/>
<!-- ===================================================================== This filter creates the document.title for GlossaryTermConcept docs. ===================================================================== --> <xsl:template match = "GlossaryTermConcept"> <xsl:variable name = "docId" select = "document('cdrutil:/docid')"/> <xsl:variable name = "def" select = "TermDefinition[1]/DefinitionText"/> <xsl:variable name = "front" select = "concat(substring($def, 1, 50), ' ...')"/> <xsl:value-of select = "concat( number( substring-after($docId, 'CDR')), ': ', $front)"/> <!-- xsl:value-of select = "concat('GlossaryTermConcept [', $docId, '] ', $front)"/> <xsl:value-of select = "$front"/ --> </xsl:template>
</xsl:transform>
